doc.field: Nashyign', nashyign' daatetshyaay eh ts'ehłegn mbaa nadįįxał tąy.
Nashyign', nashyign' daatetshyaay eh ts'ehłegn mbaa nadįįxał tąy.
down, he goes back in down and one falls down on him, on the trail.
